data.text: @StrawberryAsd @Sloosh666 @KimKardashian The brothers who were victims in the latest synagogue tragedy also had Fragile X Syndrome
@StrawberryAsd @Sloosh666 @KimKardashian EVERYONE w/ Autism diagnoses should also be tested for Fragile X Syndrome!!!

@StrawberryAsd @Sloosh666 @KimKardashian No, because uneducated people throw that word around, not knowing or caring. I am chiming in to educate, not only to let people know where the word ( the clinical word, not meant as insulting, as Kim has done,)but to educate.
@StarkCapicrn73 @Sloosh666 @KimKardashian Do you think people who use the R word knows that? I'm not sure, i just wondered.

@Sloosh666 @StrawberryAsd @KimKardashian Actually the R word... refers to the Missing FMR1 protein in the gene ( Fragile Mental Retardation) causing FRAGILE X Syndrome which is an intellectual disability. All people with Autism should get tested for Fragile X Syndrome as it is a genetic cause most don’t know about.
@Sloosh666 @KimKardashian That is horrible. Nobody should be called that, not even in jest.
